mapper.update: update game_key set user_num = #{user_num} where key_num = (SELECT key_num FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, a.* FROM game_key a where game_id = #{game_id} and user_num is null) WHERE rn = 1)
mapper.select: select order_date, o.user_num, game_id, game_name, game_price, order_status, key_num, key_id from (select * from game_key join games using (game_id) where user_num = 22) g join (select * from orders join order_detail using (order_id) where user_num = 22) o using (game_id) ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, k.*, nick_name FROM game_key k LEFT JOIN smg_users u ON k.user_num = u.user_num ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${begin} AND ${end}

SELECT * FROM (select ROWNUM rnum, k.*, nick_name from game_key k left join smg_users u on (k.user_num = u.user_num) where LOWER(${search_tag}) LIKE LOWER('%${search}%')) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${begin} AND ${end} ORDER BY ${search_tag} ASC
mapper.update: update game_key set user_num = (select user_num from smg_users where nick_name = #{nick_name}) where key_num = ${key_num} AND (select user_num from smg_users where nick_name = #{nick_name}) IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: select count(*) from game_key where game_id=#{game_id} and user_num=#{user_num}
